article.title: How to become a software developer?
article.author: Sergey Pogorelov
article.excerpt: Want to be a software developer and don't know where to start? This post is exactly for you! Nowadays a lot of people are interested in becoming a software developer. Some of them love computers and technologies and some of them just want to switch their job to a better paid one. The amount of software development courses and boot camps are instantly growing and there are more and more developers...

authors.bio: A handyman from the web-development world. Lifelong learning software developer. Passionate about Web technologies (specializes in Spring and Big Data)
authors.name: Sergey Pogorelov
